author: tmeyjes
title: Woman who had sex in Domino’s faces police questioning – but boyfriend doesn’t
text:
The couple were filmed having sex on the branch’s CCTV footage A woman who had sex in Domino’s has been ordered to attend a police interview but her boyfriend hasn’t. 
Daniella Hirst, 28, said officers had asked her to voluntary attend her local station under caution after CCTV f ootage showing her with her trousers pulled down went viral. 
Comedian shows what it would be like if we treated all crime like sexual assault However, her partner, Craig Smith, 31, has not because he remained fully-clothed throughout.
The 28-year-old told The Sun : ‘They said they had to investigate a public indecency offence because my a*** was on show in the video.
‘Never mind the fact me and Craig had sex up against the counter or that I gave him a b*** j** moments before.
&&&&& To view this video please enable JavaScript, and consider upgrading to a web browser that supports HTML5 video 
Daniella said Craig has not been asked to speak to the police while she has (Picture: Facebook) ‘Craig is apparently in the clear because his clothes stayed on. You couldn’t make it up.
‘He was the one who pulled my trousers and knickers down to have sex as we waited for our 12in.’
School 'forces boy, 14, to shave his face three times a week' The couple from Bridlington in East Yorkshire had been drinking all day before heading to a branch of the pizza chain in Scarborough.
A 40-second clip apparently showed barmaid Daniella performing a sex act on her boyfriend while staff prepared their order oblivious to what was happening.
A North Yorkshire Police spokeswoman confirmed Daniella was due to attend an interview under caution but never turned up.
Metro.co.uk has approached the force for further comment.
